column4: hey guys.. quick question, if i do an apt-get upgrade and one of the upgrades is mysql-server (which i have already running) will this update the bins? or overwrite everything?
im sure it wouldnt overwrite anything important
thanks.. :)  can anyone confirm this? :P hehe just wanna be as sure as possible
upgrades wont overwrite configuration data or anything like that.  if it needs to apt will ask you before doing so
